basics.name: Yuchen Liu
basics.summary: I’m good at working with others to build projects.  My passions lie particularly in software engineeringand  web  development.   My  goal  is  to  work  for  an  organization  which  provides  me  the  challenges  toimprove my skills and a collaborative place with others.

highlights: Utilize  multiple  RESTful  APIs  and  socket.io  to  achieve  synchronization  between  users.   Developeddeep understanding in asynchronous programming and computer networks.  Used Node.js to calculaterotation angles in 3D models and requests controlling.

projects.name: Coronavirus globe
projects.description: Node.js application with Google Cloud API and SQLITE3 storage.  Visualization via Three.js.

projects.name: SpaceX counter
projects.description: React.js application with SpaceX API display the SpaceX launches information

projects.name: Trump’s tweets sentiment analysis
projects.description: Use Twitter API and Pandas to collect and organize data.  Able to conclude Trump’s sentiment towardcentain topic and his crowd’s reaction via Seaborn visualization, numpy, and VADER
